forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 68F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
